heading: What services do i offer?
content:
• UI Development

    Build the website' UI using a variety of editing tools such as Figma and Photoshop.

  • Frontend Development

    Implementation of graphic design and UI elements

  • Headless Content Management

    Customing an existing CMS platform that best works for you.

  • Backend Development

    Server-side logic, database and API development.

heading: How long does a project take?
content: Depends on the project. A typical one-page site could take 1-2 weeks depending on the complexity of the design. Bigger projects could take months.

heading: Will the website be responsive?
content: Yes, it' standard for all website to be mobile responsive nowaways :)

heading: Who pays for hosting, domain, etc.?
content: This will depend on you. Most clients would prefer that these costs would be included as operations cost (with additional maintenance cost!) that I will charge to you. However, if you prefer to manage your own hosting and domain, then we can surely arrange that :)

heading: How often do I update?
content: I will be regularly updating you weekly.

heading: How does the payment work? What's the rate?
content:
Rate will depend on the project' complexity. My rate usually goes for $10-$15/hr. However, a one time payment could also be arranged. A single page for a static site would cost $150-$200 depending on the complexity of the page.

Available payment methods include Paypal, Gcash, and Direct Bank Transfer.
